predicates.name: Authorship
predicates.description: Relates an entity to a person who created or wrote it.

predicates.name: Location
predicates.description: Indicates the location of an entity.

predicates.name: Membership
predicates.description: Describes the membership status of an entity in an organization.

predicates.name: TypeOf
predicates.description: Specifies the type or category of an entity.

predicates.name: PartOf
predicates.description: Indicates that one entity is part of a larger set.

predicates.name: Cause
predicates.description: Describes a causal relationship between two events.

predicates.name: Effect
predicates.description: Specifies the outcome or consequence of an event.

predicates.name: TimeOf
predicates.description: Indicates the time at which an event occurred.
